Using 200401060800, I got this exception editing a cu with a lot of errors.

*** Bug 58517 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***

Hard to determine how to reproduce this, but I've removed the Assert statement
and added some protection against situations where untimely cancellation of the
refresh job would have caused the marker count to get out of sync.
No known steps to reproduce, but flagging as verified to remove it from the queue.
